This would allow her to feel safer that she can drop in and look in on her mom during the day.

requests.name: Top Freezer Fridge
requests.description:
Mr CK is a client of Thye Hua Kwan Moral Charities (THKMC). Due to his physical health, Mr CK is medically unfit for work, he depends on financial assistance for sustenance. Recently his fridge had stopped working causing all his food to turned bad. 
  
THKMC is looking for a top freezer fridge to meet Mr CK’s basic needs and support him to remain safe in the community.
   
If you know of someone who has the items for donation, please contact Jaslyn Heng at 82922216. 
    
Since October 2011, THKMC was incorporated as a charity with an IPC status to provide multiple social and welfare services to the community at large. THKMC provides assistance to the Elderly, Families, Children & Youth, and Persons with Disabilities, through more than 70 programmes and services.    
   
THK Elderly Services Division provides many programmes and services to serve the elderly in need – one of which includes THK Cluster Support. THK Cluster Support provides social support through case management, monitoring, and basic counselling services to vulnerable seniors, and facilitates coordination in the provision of community-based care and support services to the seniors. This service aims to improve the quality of life of vulnerable seniors, particularly for low or no income seniors who are socially-isolated and have minimal or no family support.

offers.name: Motorised Hospital Bed
offers.description:
The Domiflex premium nursing bed comes with continuous side safety rails which provides full safety from head to toe. Different locking positions allow flexibility for seamless safety.

Lockable Handset
The Domiflex premium nursing bed comes with an intelligent handset with a clear menu structure and ergonomic design. It has fewer buttons and large symbols which facilitate intuitive operation.
The handset can also be locked from the back using the key provided, further improving the security of the bed.

Durable Laying Surface
The laying surface of the Domiflex premium nursing bed is made of aluminium, which not only provides an ergonomic sleeping experience but also durability. It is also easily removable for cleaning.

Push-and-Ready
Assemble in less than 5 minutes without any tools, all components are pre-installed.
It is also foldable, allowing for a space-saving storage.
